item.title: Twint: Loading tweets into Kafka and Neo4j
item.description: In this post we’re going to load tweets via the twint library into Kafka, and once we’ve got them in there we’ll use the Kafka Connect Neo4j Sink Plugin to get them into Neo4j. What is twint? Twitter data has always been some of the most fun to play with, but over the years the official API has become more and more restritive, and it now takes a really long time to download enough data to do anything interesting.
